152
(1) If the judge does not know the testator personally and by his or her personal name, he or she shall confirm the testator's identity on the basis of an identity card or in another reliable manner (documents, witnesses).
(2) The judge shall confirm the identity of witnesses he or she does not know personally in the same manner.
(3) The manner of confirming the identity of the testator and the witnesses shall be stated in the minutes.
